subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps fell asleep while stretching and napped through a preliminary heat for the 400-meter freestyle. That prevented him from qualifying in the event, but he came back to win the 400 individual medley at the Columbus Grand Prix in Ohio. Phelps won in 4 minutes 13.73 seconds. Katie Hoff won the women’s 400 I.M. in 4:34.49.
